ai.summary: Draft Line is a very short, easy hike in the UK, covering just 0.2 km. Suitable for all ages and fitness levels, it serves as a quick outdoor connection or urban nature stroll.
ai.terrain_summary: Flat, well-maintained path with minimal elevation. Likely paved or compact gravel surface, suitable for strollers and wheelchairs on most segments.
ai.safety_notes: Even on short routes, be aware of other pedestrians and cyclists. Check weather forecast before starting; daylight hours and visibility can vary. Stay on marked paths, watch for uneven surfaces, and carry a phone with emergency contacts.
ai.best_seasons: Year-round practicality in the UK; spring and autumn offer milder temperatures, while winter can be windy and wet and summer can be warmer but brief.
